knimeNode.name: Unzip Files
knimeNode.shortDescription: Unzips files from a zip file.

fullDescription.intro: This node unzips files from a zip file. The path to the files will be contained in the output table.
fullDescription.option: Path to the output directory, where the files will be extracted to.

Specifies the content of the output table.
Location A string column with the path to the extracted files.
URI An URI column with the URIs to the extracted files.

Specifies the behavior if a file with the same name already exists.
Overwrite
Overwrites already existing files.
Abort
Will abort if a file already exists.
